PROJECTS.title: Alzaid
PROJECTS.description: Contributed in the development of a Mobile App for an alzheimer elderly care home. Implemented CRUD operations to manage patients daily records, activities and incidences. Front-end was built using TypeScript, Angular, Ionic, HTML and CSS. Back-end was developed using NodeJS, Express and MongoDB

PROJECTS.title: Barber Brothers
PROJECTS.description: Developed an android app using Kotlin for a local barber shop. Implemented CRUD operations to manage appointments, employees and services offered. Incorporated Firebase for: authentications, firestore, storage and push notifications.  Use of coroutines and MVVM.

PROJECTS.title: My portfolio
PROJECTS.description: Developed a web app using React to showcase who I am, my skills and some of my projects. Achieved responsive design thanks to the implementation of Material-UI and Media Query.
